metadata.title: Paala Talikalu | పాల తాలికలు | Vinayaka Chavithi Prasadam | Ganesh Chaturthi Recipes | Vinayakudi Naivedyam
metadata.description: A traditional recipe for Paala Talikalu, a sweet dish made with rice flour, jaggery, and milk, specially prepared as a prasad for the Vinayaka Chavithi festival. This dish is also a significant part of Telugu wedding traditions.
